Reviews.Title: “Decent budget hotel”
Reviews.Author: umyaya
Reviews.Content: decent budget hotel service friendly helpful decent free breakfast buffet filling english available modest charge bed comfortable clean carpets bit worn repair overall pleasant located quiet square couple blocks street tons ethnic eateries 10 minute walk tube stops park stayed 7 nights

Reviews.Title: “Budget as they come”

Reviews.Content: choose hotel becasue cheap nice hotel little hard taxi driver warmly welcomed staff smallish bathroom cuboard decently clean furniture bit looking window hard close 1 staff hand breakfast price bit pricey decided breakfast elsewhere staff nice knowledge live hotel free wifi buy card access computer wifi floorboard creaky hear people walking

Reviews.Content: husband stayed umi night prior departure tour decided stay hotel convenient priced reception staff friendly happy offer suggestions fill day london disappointing rest hotel definite slant putting feeling drinks havent bathroom door kept due lean sounds bad proximity train station shops

Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel 2 times satisfied clean spacy bigger amenities roomtv hair fan tea pot dont walls hall thin sometimes annoying hotels rate tryed stress arrange continental english breakfast morning cafe 5 minutes walk stuff hospitable helpfull umi located close quarters sights parks shops dont waist time nice hotel price

Reviews.Content: booked superior double valentines day night girlfriend tube bayswater lovely london short walk nice buildings exceptionally beautiful checked hotel staff friendly pay â£20 deposit mention website nervous trip elevator 3rd floor decided pay extra superior double compared regular double night valentines day entered found list 5 holes walls light switches loose uneven floor single glazed windows draft couldnt shut properly sink wasnt bathroom bedroom shower dirty carpets stained headboard hung badly wall connected bed view roof gap door corridor combined window draft cold superior hate imagine regular double needless staying id urge people hotel
